title: The Turning
description: There's a prophecy that Ruin needs to fulfill and he is careful to follow his directives to the letter. But when he is shown his latest assignment, he cannot carry it out, he will not.  "You feel his pain, his torment … you ask yourself what would you do, what are you capable of? You find yourself in the thick of it all, watching, waiting. You empathize with this devastated hero, and his beloved Isadora … you have become so close to her that you gasp when she realizes what she must do because it’s the only answer for everyone. " .....Adona
author: Lucian Bane
